Name: Golden Insect
Description: Maqi is trying to contact you, and it appears to be related to the Pioneer Association's ambitious project, "Second Coming of Solaris"...
QuestDesc: Maqi is trying to contact you, and it appears to be related to the Pioneer Association's ambitious project, "Second Coming of Solaris"...

Dialogues.Speaker: Maqi
Dialogues.PlotLineKey: Let me explain our job today.

Dialogues.Speaker: Maqi
Dialogues.PlotLineKey: In this chapter, our protagonist paid a visit to a mystic island.

Dialogues.Speaker: Maqi
Dialogues.PlotLineKey: It goes: "The autumn seemed to be permanent here. Leaves and foliage were bathed in burning gold..."

Dialogues.Speaker: Maqi
Dialogues.PlotLineKey: "As the sea breeze gently met the shore, a golden shower fell upon our shoulders..."

Dialogues.Speaker: Maqi
Dialogues.PlotLineKey: "For once, I caught a whiff of fragrance in the fallen leaves... It was only many years later that I realized it had been a kind of golden insect hidden in camouflage in those leaves."

Dialogues.Speaker: Maqi
Dialogues.PlotLineKey: The insect served as a metaphor by the author for the following plots.

Dialogues.Speaker: Maqi
Dialogues.PlotLineKey: What's more. At the end of this chapter, the elders of the island would use this insect toâ€”

Options.PlotLineKey: I want to see it myself when the game comes online.

Dialogues.Speaker: Maqi
Dialogues.PlotLineKey: Sorry, my bad... This is one of my favorite bits so I got carried away.

Dialogues.Speaker: Maqi
Dialogues.PlotLineKey: Anyway, the dev team wants a reference for such an important element in future plots.

Dialogues.Speaker: Maqi
Dialogues.PlotLineKey: If you happen to come across some samples, feel free to drop by.

Dialogues.Speaker: Maqi
Dialogues.PlotLineKey: The bug does have elegant patterns. Thank you for your efforts. I'll deliver it to the dev team.

Dialogues.Speaker: Maqi
Dialogues.PlotLineKey: It will contribute a lot to the building of the island.

Dialogues.Speaker: Speaker_undefined
Dialogues.PlotLineKey: Some time passed while Maqi was away to hand over the item...

Dialogues.Speaker: Maqi
Dialogues.PlotLineKey: Thank you. That wraps up today's work!

Dialogues.Speaker: Maqi
Dialogues.PlotLineKey: See you tomorrow, {PlayerName}.

Dialogues.Speaker: Maqi
Dialogues.PlotLineKey: An entomologist... I have no clues.

Dialogues.Speaker: Maqi
Dialogues.PlotLineKey: Maybe you should go to the pond. Some kids are frequently seen catching flies there.

Dialogues.Speaker: Mingming
Dialogues.PlotLineKey: Do {Male=you;Female=you} like these bugs too?

Dialogues.Speaker: Doudou
Dialogues.PlotLineKey: No, Mingming. {Male=He;Female=She} needs you to answer a question.

Dialogues.Speaker: Doudou
Dialogues.PlotLineKey: Daddy has told us stories about it. The legend of a hero! Do you still remember?

Dialogues.Speaker: Mingming
Dialogues.PlotLineKey: Oh, I know! And a hero and a big bad guy, the Hatless, right?!

Dialogues.Speaker: Doudou
Dialogues.PlotLineKey: So, {Male=you;Female=you} are looking for the insect in the book, right?

Dialogues.Speaker: Doudou
Dialogues.PlotLineKey: A golden fly that smells sweet... Sounds like the yellow butterfly we caught today.

Dialogues.Speaker: Mingming
Dialogues.PlotLineKey: A giant yellow butterfly! Just show {Male=him;Female=her} what we get!

Dialogues.Speaker: Doudou
Dialogues.PlotLineKey: Take a look, {Male=sir;Female=miss}. We had it in the shrubs.

Dialogues.Speaker: Mingming
Dialogues.PlotLineKey: It feeds on honey and smells sweet just like the kind of candy Daddy would treat us to.

Dialogues.Speaker: Mingming
Dialogues.PlotLineKey: Hehe, I kid you not!

Dialogues.Speaker: Mingming
Dialogues.PlotLineKey: Of course! But promise me to come over to play hide-and-seek with us!

Options.PlotLineKey: I'm quite the expert at this.

Dialogues.Speaker: Mingming
Dialogues.PlotLineKey: Daddy taught us tricks. You can't mess around!

Dialogues.Speaker: Mingming
Dialogues.PlotLineKey: Please accept the butterfly. And don't forget your promise!

Dialogues.Speaker: Doudou
Dialogues.PlotLineKey: Until then!

Dialogues.Speaker: Mingming
Dialogues.PlotLineKey: Hide-and-seek! Hide-and-seek!

Dialogues.Speaker: Mingming
